title: Chloe New for Women. Eau De Parfum Spray 2.5-Ounces
description: When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you.  For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear.  Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied

title: NOW Foods Rose Hip Seed Oil, 1 ounce
description: Rich in Omega-6 essential fatty acids, Rose Hip Seed Oil continues to serve as one of the personal care industry's most sought-after natural oils.  NOW® Rose Hip Seed Oil is 100% Pure and Natural, and extracted from the seeds of Rose mosqueta.
